name: eTherapi
tag_list: health-it, health-2-0, mental-health, behavioral-health, online-counseling, video-conferencing, behavioral-healthcare, mental-healthcare, telehealth, telemedicine, healthcare
overview: eTherapi is an online therapy provider—the only one founded and managed by a team of medical doctors and psychiatrists, several of whom are affiliated with Stanford University—that connects adults seeking to improve their mental and emotional wellbeing to licensed therapists who provide counseling online via live video conferencing. eTherapi offers a comprehensive array of services including a directory of thoroughly screened therapists; a superior video conferencing platform; scheduling and payment processing; and reports for primary care physicians Founded in 2011, the eTherapi team includes Dr. Farzad Soleimani, who holds four degrees from Stanford University; Dr. Elias Aboujaoude, a practicing psychiatrist who is a clinical associate professor in psychiatry at Stanford University School of Medicine and author of Virtually You: The Dangerous Powers of the E-Personality; Dr. Jennifer Hoblyn, an assistant professor of psychiatry and behavioral sciences at Stanford University School of Medicine; Dr. Marvin H. Firestone, a renowned expert in psychiatry and legal medicine; and Kamila Malinowski who holds an MBA from Stanford University. For more information: http://www.etherapi.com
